H0.text: Kinetic energy is the type of energy that anything moving has.

H1.text: Magnetic is the type of energy that anything moving has.

H2.text: Potential is the type of energy that anything moving has.

H3.text: Thermal is the type of energy that anything moving has.

A4.text: In physics, the kinetic energy of an object is the form of energy that it possesses due to its motion.

A5.text: The kinetic energy of a non-rotating object of mass m traveling at a speed v is 1/2 m v^2.
